segments.text: Your dog is so much fun . He ’ s so playful . I wish our cat enjoyed being around people as much as your dog does .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cats are well know for being more independent than dogs . How old is your cat now ? you ’ Ve had her longer than we ’ Ve had our dog .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She ’ s eight years old . She ’ s getting quite old . Your dog ’ s six , isn ’ t he ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . He ’ s so energetic . We take him out to the park every morning and evening . I think he ’ d be happy to stay there all day !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sure he would . We usually have to drag him home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your cat spends most of the day outdoors ' , right ? Do you kino where she goes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She spends less time outdoors and she used to . we have no idea where she goes . She ’ s very secretive . Occasionally , she brings back a dead mouse .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever thought about having another pet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The kids want a rabbit . I don ’ t think it would be a good idea to get a mouse or a fish ! That might be too tempting for our cat !
segments.speaker: S1
